titleStmt.title: An oath to be administred unto all officers, souldiers, and such other persons as are or shall be within the garrison of Oxford. Published by authority.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed at Oxford by Leonard Litchfield, printer to the Vniversity. And reprinted at London for Matthew Walbancke.,

notesStmt.note: A reprint of: An oath to be administred unto all officers and souldier and such other persons as are, or shall be within the garrison of Oxford (Wing O79, Madan 1764), a broadside.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
